channel.title: A few coding questions....Lookie :) (You might know a few ;P)
channel.description:
Welp, here they are :) I'll cross 'em off if they're answered....And I understand it and have fixed/done it. :)
[s]1) How do you make NPC's do emotes?[/s]
2) How do you get rid of ALL the teleportation spells (including the ones I have on the ancients tab)
3) How do I make requirements for magic spells (including ancients) and the requirement of runes to use them
[s]4) How do you change the coordinates of where you start out when you join, and the coords when you die? [/s]
That's it o_O Please help :)

item.title: A few coding questions....Lookie :) (You might know a few ;P)
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

  1. How do you get rid of ALL the teleportation spells (including the ones I have on the ancients tab)
    find the x coord that one takes you to and search it in client.java. when you find it simply deleat the coords and it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: A few coding questions....Lookie :) (You might know a few ;P)
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

To change the death coords, search for this in you client.java…

public boolean ApplyDead()

Then it should take you somewhere at the bottom of the client.java, then scroll down a bit and you should see something like this:

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) { DeadStats(); keepItem1(); keepItem2(); keepItem3(); deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount); deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2); deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3); youdied(); teleportToX = 3163; teleportToY = 3674; IsDeadTeleporting = true; frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); PoisonDelay = 9999999; KillerId = playerId; if(keepItem != 0) addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount); if(keepItem2 != 0) addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2); if(keepItem3 != 0) addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

Change the coords here…

teleportToX = 3163; teleportToY = 3674;

And it should change the death respawn point… ;D

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

those are teleports not spells…

  1. how to make requirements on spells

just search for the spell and they will have thing like if playerlevel[6] >= 94 change the 94 to the level you want

for runes they will also have if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true))
{

those are the rune ids you can change them and the amount if you dont have them add it under if(playerlevel[6]>=

item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

4.Open Player.java and search “inital” and it says start co-ordinates of player.
It has 2 different co-ordinates.
2345;2534-X
4353;3434-Y
You change them both to the same co-ordinates.
